commit.message:
fix(depot-map): Implement working Leaflet-based map solution

- Replace non-working SimpleDepotMap with Leaflet
- Use OpenStreetMap tiles for base layer
- Dynamic import to avoid SSR issues
- Proper track polylines with colors
- Train markers with custom icons
- Popups with train/track information
- Legend and info panels
- Fixed all TypeScript errors
- Tested build successfully

BREAKING: Removed SimpleDepotMap and MapLibre implementations
commit.author: Christian Schmeing
